name: High Elf Noble
description: The High Elf Noble embodies elegance and charisma typical of high elf lineage, wielding a rapier and capable of spellcasting.
memorable: Notable for their social prowess and ability to manipulate social situations.
goals: Focus on social interactions and gaining influence in social encounters.
relations: May associate with other high elves or nobility.
environment: Often found in courtly or diplomatic settings.
strengths: Excellent in deception, intimidation, and persuasion, making them formidable in social situations.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and constitution limits resilience in direct combat.
attacks: Attacks with a rapier dealing piercing damage; uses Ray of Frost to impair movement.
most_powerful_ability: Ray of Frost can deal cold damage and reduce target's speed, providing strategic combat advantages.
skills: Excels in deception, intimidation, performance, and persuasion, showcasing strong social skills.
additional_information: Can use Parry to increase AC against attacks.
Uses Ray of Frost cantrip for offense and control.
Total charm from high charisma aids in negotiations.
spellcasting: Can cast the cantrip Ray of Frost for ranged cold damage and speed reduction.
test_queries: elegant high elf with social skills
high elf skilled in deception and intimidation
noble that can cast Ray of Frost
high elf melee attacker with parry ability
